Common Workflow Issues

Angular Tests & Builds

TypeScript Compilation Errors

Issues with types, imports, and module declarations in Angular components.

Resolution:
  • Use strict type checking with --strict flag
  • Update imports to use correct paths
  • Ensure proper module declarations
  • Check standalone component configuration

SCSS Deprecations

Using deprecated SCSS features and syntax.

Resolution:
  • Replace @import with @use and @forward
  • Update color functions to modern alternatives
  • Use CSS calc() for divisions

HTTP Testing Issues

Problems with HttpTestingController in Angular tests.

Resolution:
  • Verify expectOne/expectMany usage
  • Check request matching criteria
  • Ensure proper test cleanup

Server Tests

MongoDB Connection Issues

Database connection failures in tests.

Resolution:
  • Verify MongoDB service is running
  • Check connection string format
  • Ensure proper environment variables

CI Environment

Husky Git Hooks

Git hooks failing in CI environment.

Resolution:
  • Run disable-husky-in-ci.js in prepare script
  • Add CI detection to .huskyrc
  • Skip hooks in CI environment
